onboarding.caved.prealpha_reminder: Keep in mind this is a pre-alpha
onboarding.caved.troubleshoot_advice: If something breaks, click {{report}} to report it, or {{probe}} to investigate.
onboarding.caved.usage: Watch games quietly download, install, and run.
onboarding.collections.auto_sync: Your games will be here when you come back.
onboarding.collections.usage: Browse the site a little, then use {{add_to_collection}} to start organizing.
onboarding.dashboard.mission_statement: We've tried to make it the comfiest.
onboarding.dashboard.selling_points: Instant set-up, and as few barriers as we can manage.
onboarding.owned.batteries_included: We've put together a few collections so you can start playing right away.
onboarding.owned.navigation_hint: Click the labels on your left to navigate around the app
onboarding.owned.reassuring_comment: Things are looking a bit empty right now, but no worries!
sandbox.setup.title: One-time sandbox setup
sandbox.setup.windows.message: In order to run games in the itch.io sandbox, a one-time setup procedure needs to be run as Administrator.
sandbox.setup.windows.detail: After clicking 'Proceed', a permission prompt will pop up, asking you for your approval. This will add an `itch-player` user account to shield your games from the rest of you system.
sandbox.setup.linux.message: In order to run games in the itch.io sandbox, a one-time setup script has to be run as root.
sandbox.setup.linux.detail: After clicking 'Proceed', a prompt will pop up, asking you for your password. This is only needed for the first sandbox launch, and your password is never seen nor recorded by itch.
preferences.security.sandbox.title: Enable itch.io sandbox
preferences.security.sandbox.description: The itch.io sandbox will try to prevent games you download from doing harmful things or stealing sensitive data. While it's not a complete safety guarantee, running games in the itch.io sandbox is much safer.
preferences.install_location.delete: Remove this install location and uninstall its contents
preferences.install_location.is_default: New items will install to this location by default.
preferences.install_location.make_defaul: Set this as the default install location
preferences.behavior.close_to_tray: Keep app in tray when closing window
pick_install_upload.title: Multiple downloads are available for {{title}}
pick_install_upload.message: Which file do you want to download for {{title}}?
pick_install_upload.detail: We'll ask you again when new downloads are available.
pick_update_upload.title: New downloads are available for {{title}}
pick_update_upload.message: Which file do you want to update to for {{title}}?
pick_update_upload.detail: We only ask because you hand-picked a file at install time.

prompt.additional_purchase.message: You already own a copy of {{title}}.
prompt.additional_purchase.title: You already own this!

prompt.abort_game.message: Do you want to force {{title}} to close?
prompt.crash_reporter.detail: A crash log has been written to {{location}}.
prompt.deb_policy.detail: itch can only install portable versions of Linux applications.
prompt.deb_policy.message: {{title}} uses the .deb package format, and cannot be installed with itch until it is repackaged.
prompt.deb_policy.title: APT packages are not supported
prompt.forget_session.detail: You can always add it back later.
prompt.forget_session.message: Are you sure you want to remove '{{username}}' from your saved sessions?
prompt.forget_session.title: Forget session
prompt.install_location_add.title: Pick a new install location
prompt.install_location_not_empty.detail: It needs to be done manually for the time being.
prompt.install_location_not_empty.messag: Install locations can only be removed when all their contents has been uninstalled.
prompt.install_location_not_empty.title: This install location is not empty
prompt.install_location_remove.detail: Any items installed at {{location}} will be uninstalled.
prompt.install_location_remove.message: Are you sure you want to remove this location?
prompt.install_location_remove.title: Removing an install location
prompt.last_remaining_install_location.c: This is the last remaining install location, and it cannot be removed until another is added first.
prompt.logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
prompt.logout_detail: In-progress downloads will be paused until you log in again.
prompt.no_compatible_version.detail: Perhaps this {{classification}} isn't compatible with it yet?
prompt.no_compatible_version.message: We couldn't find a version of {{title}} for {{platform}}.
prompt.no_compatible_version.title: {{title}} on {{platform}}
prompt.payments_disabled.detail: Maybe you can find another way to support them?
prompt.payments_disabled.message: Unfortunately, the developer of {{title}} does not accept payments for this title.
prompt.payments_disabled.title: Payments disabled
prompt.rpm_policy.detail: itch can only install portable versions of Linux applications.
prompt.rpm_policy.message: {{title}} uses the .rpm package format, and cannot be installed with itch until it is repackaged.
prompt.rpm_policy.title: YUM packages are not supported
prompt.self_update.message.linux: You can either download it manually, or use your distribution's package manager to upgrade: head to the website for more instructions.
prompt.self_update.message.osx: Pick 'Download now' to install it automatically, or head to the website for more instructions.
prompt.self_update.message.windows: Pick 'Download now' to install it automatically, or head to the website for more instructions.
prompt.self_update.title: itch v{{version}} is available for download
prompt.self_update_ready.message:
Choose 'Restart now' to already take the advantage of the update

If you won't, the update will be active next time the app will be restarted
